name: Tapestry: The Abandonment of Psyche
maker: After design by François Boucher, and woven under the direction of Nicolas Besnier, and Jean-Baptiste Oudry, et al
description: Tapestry: The Abandonment of Psyche; After design by François Boucher (French, 1703 - 1770), and woven under the direction of Nicolas Besnier (French, 1714 - 1754), and Jean-Baptiste Oudry (French, 1686 - 1755), et al; Beauvais, France; about 1741 - 1742; Silk and wool; modern cotton lining; 377.8 x 282.2 cm (148 3/4 x 111 1/8 in.); 63.DD.3; Gift of J. Paul Getty; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
title: Tapestry: The Abandonment of Psyche
medium: Silk and wool; modern cotton lining
